profile: A passionate Fullstack Web Developer with hands-on experience in building modern, responsive, and scalable web applications using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Laravel. Skilled in both frontend and backend development, with a strong understanding of UI/UX principles and database design. Demonstrated experience in public sector digital projects and freelance applications, with a focus on clean code, performance, and usability. [cite: 4, 5]

work_experience.company: Dinas Komunikasi dan Informatika Kabupaten Pasuruan
responsibilities: Redesigned and modernized the official website of Kabupaten Pasuruan, improving UI/UX and performance.
Developed a web-based job analysis application to support internal HR data management and efficiency.
Successfully migrated SIM PKK app to a self-hosted VPS environment with Nginx and MinIO S3 implies improvement in data control.
Collaborate with internal teams to gather requirements, design database structures, and implement scalable web solutions.
Developed a simple backend API for fraud detection, later integrated as a foundation for fraud prevention features in chat systems.
Built a machine learning model to identify potential fraudulent activity based on user input data.
Conducted manual QA testing for the Tetanggaku mobile application to ensure reliability and user experience quality.

certifications: Complete Intro to SQL & PostgreSQL | Frontend Masters (2025)
Belajar Membuat Aplikasi Android Intermediate | Dicoding (2023)

projects.name: Achivio
projects.description: Freelance project providing an alternative question bank and tryout platform to help students prepare for exams.
responsibilities: Developed key features including user authentication, question and answer management interface, and responsive UI design.
Collaborated with a small team to ensure performance, accessibility, and intuitive user experience.

projects.name: Bilik Tani
projects.description: web app to help farmers calculate crop productivity forecasts, agricultural land drainage and information of plants and pests.
responsibilities: Developed feature user authentication, plant and pests information page, short note page and planting schedule data.

projects.name: Besmart
projects.description: Web and mobile application to support PT. Amerta Indah Otsuka marketing team to record their employee activity
responsibilities: Developed frontend web application for admin dashboard, integrating with backend service for data handling.

achievements: Finalist Gen Al Hackathon APAC Edition (2024): Work as Mobile Developer using Kotlin
Top 65 Capstone Project Bangkit Academy (2023): Work as Mobile Developer using Kotlin

details: Being one of 5.010 students who were selected from 67.387 applicants across Indonesia.
Completed intensive fullstack development bootcamp with Next JS technology
Be able to build a fullstack website from scratch, including file storage, oauth and LLM integration.
